scripts.start-app: concurrently "cd src/server && npm start" "cd src/frontend && npm start"
scripts.init-setup: npm install && concurrently "cd src/client && npm install" "cd src/server && npm install"
scripts.init-setup-run: npm run init-setup && npm run start-app
scripts.test: (cd src/client && npm run test -- --watchAll=false) && (cd src/server && npm run test -- --watchAll=false)
